name: Hatsune Miku and Future Stars: Project Mirai
overview: Hatsune Miku and Future Stars: Project Mirai is a spin-off of the Project Diva series of games. The characters in the game are all super-deformed and take on the appearance of Good Smile Company's Nendoroid collectible toys. The game's primary gameplay is the Chance Circle System. Buttons will appear around the border of a circle and a pointer will appear from the center of the circle extending all the way outside the border. It will then turn clockwise or counter-clockwise and when the pointer passes the button the player has to press the corresponding button. The music videos of the songs in-game are partly animations of the characters like in the previous games but some songs include the original music video with additional 3D effects.
